Docs.param: The unique ID of the application.
to indicate the application should be preloaded; otherwise, .
Docs.summary: Notifies ASP.NET that a particular application that is running on [!INCLUDE[iisver](~/includes/iisver-md.md)] is configured to be preloaded.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This method implements the <xref:System.Web.Hosting.IApplicationPreloadManager.SetApplicationPreloadState%2A> method of the <xref:System.Web.Hosting.IApplicationPreloadManager> interface. [!INCLUDE[iisver](~/includes/iisver-md.md)] calls the <xref:System.Web.Hosting.IApplicationPreloadManager.SetApplicationPreloadState%2A> method to notify ASP.NET whether the application that is being loaded supports preloading.
> [!NOTE] > This method applies only to applications that run on [!INCLUDE[iisver](~/includes/iisver-md.md)].

Docs.exception:
The instance that contains information for preloading the application is or empty.
-or-
is or empty.
-or-
is set to and the process host was not previously passed an interface to its method

Docs.param: The handle to an unmanaged interface in [!INCLUDE[iisver](~/includes/iisver-md.md)] that ASP.NET calls to get information.
Docs.summary: Creates a type that calls [!INCLUDE[iisver](~/includes/iisver-md.md)] to get information that is required in order to preload an application.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This method implements the <xref:System.Web.Hosting.IApplicationPreloadManager.SetApplicationPreloadUtil%2A> method of the <xref:System.Web.Hosting.IApplicationPreloadManager> interface. The method creates an instance of the <xref:System.Web.Hosting.IApplicationPreloadUtil> type, which calls into [!INCLUDE[iisver](~/includes/iisver-md.md)] to get preloading information.
> [!NOTE] > This method applies only to applications that run on [!INCLUDE[iisver](~/includes/iisver-md.md)].

Docs.exception: The instance that contains information for preloading the application is not .
